title: HS3
text: Lightweight closed-back headphones that meet all modern gaming headset standards.

title: Metal frame
text: The structure of the headset is based on a soft headband, made of high-quality eco-leather with a thick metal frame inside. Due to its versatility, this type of construction provides a snug fit, while maintaining comfort even during prolonged use.

title: Braided cable
text: The Dark Project HS-3 headphone cable is covered with a protective braid that protects against adverse effects.

title: Modular microphone
text: The detachable microphone of the HS-3 headset is equipped with a pop filter, and the flexible metal stem is covered with a rubberized layer of protection, and the highly detailed voice recording is sure to impress you and your teammates.

title: Control panel
text: A control panel is located on the keyboard wire, which makes it easy to mute the microphone and adjust the sound without having to open software or system settings.

title: Neodymium drivers 50 mm
text: With internal speaker architecture with neodymium magnets and closed drivers, high sound performance is ensured, positioning in games is clearly defined and their directionality is unmistakable.
